mapper.select: SELECT id, ( SELECT dict_label FROM js_sys_dict_data jsdd WHERE dict_type = 'aa_maintenance_type' AND jsdd.dict_value = cm.service_type ) AS service_type, service_date, maintenance_total_id FROM common_maintenance cm where cm.maintenance_total_id = #{maintenance.maintenanceTotalId}

SELECT id, result_code, result_msg, maintenance_total_id, ( SELECT dict_label FROM js_sys_dict_data jsdd WHERE dict_type = 'aa_maintenance_type' AND jsdd.dict_value = cm.service_type ) AS service_type, service_date, brand, model_name, series_name, vin, manufacturer, make_date, transmission_type, displacement, effluent_standard, ( SELECT dict_label FROM js_sys_dict_data jsdd WHERE dict_type = 'sys_yes_no' AND jsdd.dict_value = cm.car_fire_flag ) AS car_fire_flag, ( SELECT dict_label FROM js_sys_dict_data jsdd WHERE dict_type = 'sys_yes_no' AND jsdd.dict_value = cm.car_fire_flag ) AS car_water_flag, ( SELECT dict_label FROM js_sys_dict_data jsdd WHERE dict_type = 'sys_yes_no' AND jsdd.dict_value = cm.car_fire_flag ) AS car_component_records_flag, ( SELECT dict_label FROM js_sys_dict_data jsdd WHERE dict_type = 'sys_yes_no' AND jsdd.dict_value = cm.car_fire_flag ) AS car_construct_records_flag, ( SELECT dict_label FROM js_sys_dict_data jsdd WHERE dict_type = 'sys_yes_no' AND jsdd.dict_value = cm.car_fire_flag ) AS car_outside_records_flag, ( SELECT dict_label FROM js_sys_dict_data jsdd WHERE dict_type = 'sys_yes_no' AND jsdd.dict_value = cm.car_fire_flag ) AS mileage_is_normal_flag, mileage_estimate, last_main_tain_time, main_tain_times, last_repair_time, mileage_every_year FROM common_maintenance cm WHERE cm.id = #{maintenance.id}
